hero.headline: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subheadline: Start free, scale as you grow

faq.question: Can I change plans later?
faq.answer: Yes, upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes take effect immediately.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: All major credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfer for annual enterprise plans.

faq.question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
faq.answer: Yes! Save 20% when you pay annually.

hero.headline: About FlowStack
hero.subheadline: Building the future of work since 2020

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: FlowStack was founded in 2020 by a team of engineers frustrated with fragmented, overcomplicated work tools. We believe software should adapt to how you work, not the other way around. Our mission is to help every team ship better work, faster.

team.name: Jordan Lee
team.bio: Ex-Stripe engineer, built systems at scale
